name: zoo

A1 an area in which animals, especially wild animals, are kept so that people can go and look at them or study them
a place where there are a lot of people and their behaviour is not well organized or controlled: The school cafeteria is a zoo.
More examplesFewer examplesHow about a trip to the zoo this afternoon?Tea-time in our house is like feeding time at the zoo!"Did the kids enjoy their trip to the zoo?" "Oh, yes, they were full of it when they got back this afternoon."The bad weather really took the gloss off our trip to the zoo.We could hear the lions roaring at the other end of the zoo.
